build1.name: Minecraft Battle
build1.description: This is a scene of a Minecraft character in diamond armor fighting an Ender Man, and the Ender Dragon! I made this scene in one day, but built the dragon before this. These pieces are from a Minecraft Lego set I got for Christmas

build2.name: Charizard
build2.description: This is a Charizard I built with extra legos laying around, I did it by myself without a guide!

build3.name: Ender Dragon
build3.description: This is the Ender Dragon from Mincraft. I built him from a set I got for Christmas, and I used him in another build I made of a Battle between a Mindcraft Character, and the dragon!

build4.name: Jurassic Park T-Rex Transport
build4.description: This is a semi truck I built to carry my toy T-rex! The t-rex isn't a lego toy so i didn't build him, but I build the truck!

build5.name: Harry Potter Spiders
build5.description: This is a scary scene I made on Halloween with a Harry Potter set!
